title: How do I transmit a  file via  Bluetooth？
answer:
1、Touch Music or Gallery and select any file to be sent. Touch and hold the file and touch Share > Bluetooth.  
2、Open the web browser and access any page. Press![](http://consumer.huawei.com/resource/Image/0-111115141155.PNG) and touch More > Share page > Bluetooth.  
3、In Contacts, press![](http://consumer.huawei.com/resource/Image/0-111115141207.PNG) and touch Muti-select> Send > Bluetooth.
